import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Helmet} from "react-helmet"; import './Reg.css' import axios from 'axios' const apisingin = 'Register' export default class Reg extends Component { handleSubmitSingin = e => { e.preventDefault(); const data = { email : this.email, password : this.password, firstname:this.firstname, lastname: this.lastname, birthday: this.birthday, tel: this.tel } axios.post(apisingin,data) .then( res => { console.log(data) console.log(res) alert("สมัครสมาชิกสำเร็จ") window.location.assign("http://localhost:3000") } ).catch( err => { console.log(err) } ) } render() { return (
My Title

แบบฟอร์มสมัครสมาชิก


this.email = e.target.value } className="form-control" placeholder="Enter email" required />
this.password = e.target.value } className="form-control" placeholder="Password" required/>
this.firstname = e.target.value } className="form-control" placeholder="ชื่อ" required/>
this.lastname = e.target.value } className="form-control" placeholder="นามสกุล" required/>
this.birthday = e.target.value } className="form-control" placeholder="วันเกิด" required/>
this.tel = e.target.value } className="form-control" placeholder="เบอร์โทรศัพท์" required/>
) } }
